title: A Choice of two
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Fraud investigation
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/White collar crimes
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Film festivals - Canada - Toronto - Awards
description: White-collar crime and corporate in-fighting merge as a chairman of the board must choose his successor from between two competent executives. All eyes are on the contenders when it is discovered that a defrauding of Farabee Industries is being orchestrated by someone within the arena of power. This drama was based on an actual case history and looks at an aspect of business ethics. Stars Leslie Nielsen. (Awards: Toronto)
